column3: EiffelStudio list of to-do functionality
Description
Use DLLs throughout the interface
Refactoring tool
Auto-hide tools like VC++
Send bug report automatically in case of crash
Save workspace altogether
Improve output (separate compilation errors, runtime messages, breakpoint info and system info)
Give current interface status (Compiling, running, editing)
Tip of the day
Feature tree: clicking a feature clause should center the editor onto it
Feature tree: give different icons for the various types of feature (once, deferred, do, external, attribute)
When minimizing tools, let them keep their place instead of putting them at the bottom
Optimize useless computations for tools that are not displayed
Give a warning when no match is found in the address manager
Add a status bar
Improve the default handling of tool sizes
Make it easier to import libraries (XML description file for each) + make it possible to generate such XML files
Make it possible to launch an external command by giving it the current class
Support CVS from within EiffelStudio
Add a test wizard
Improve new class command (deferred, parents,…)
Improve new cluster command (import existing cluster, create top-level cluster)
New blank project: let the user choose the root class name and root feature name
Give support for the feature tree even if the project is half-compiled
Eiffel beautifier (automatically indents the text correctly and put it in the editor = clickable + load_text)
At start-up, propose to create a library instead of an executable
Add a recompile from scratch command
Make it easier to precompile several libraries
Light development window = old class tool
Save preferences for several types of development windows
When manually editing the Ace file, the project settings dialog should vanish automatically
Add cluster too complex in the project settings dialog
Need for a standard tools menu, where external executables can be launched
Add a cell separator in toolbars
Add a pretty print button to reformat quickly a class
Add a close menu in the file menu, to close the current file
Add a central dictionary of ordered classes somewhere to optimize some things
Add a class with queries relative to the validity of names (for classes, features, system,…)
Save all backed up files in a file, and propose to reopen these back-ups at next start-up
In the new blank project wizard, let the user choose the name of the root_class and of the root_cluster
Give a different icon in the cluster tree to deferred/effective classes
Give a way to choose among the last 'star-list' in the address (such as not closing the choice dialog when ctrl is pressed at selection time)

Support Ctrl-right click everywhere + add a preference telling what to do (open a new window, a new editor window, a new context window, send to current editor, send to current context, send to external editor...)
Do not display obsolete features in the exported features
Let the user customize the formats
Add a formatter that yields the path/cluster/indexing clause of a class
Give features without a named feature clause
Unify names (interface vs flat contracts...)
Add a formatter for the invariant
List of class names and class paths in the system
Let the user print the format
For all feature formats, give the choice between the name-only display, the basic text display and the flat form
Being able to query location of creation of class instance
Being able to find location of assignment to an attribute
List of creation features for a class
Feature evaluation
debug_output feature used to display objects in the debugger
STRING viewer in the object tool
Stack overflow detection
Allow to choose on which exceptions the program should stop
Support debugging of processes not launched from EiffelStudio (like VC++)
Give the ability to override violated assertions and continue anyway
Edit and Continue: Modifications are taken into account without killing and restarting the application
Object/local edition
Conditional breakpoints, feature-triggered breakpoints, counter breakpoint
Do not collapse the object tree at each step
Know the static type of Void objects
Breakpoints in editor mode
Improve invariant support (know which class the invariant comes from, have the invariant in the call stack)
Debugger loses focus when running the application
Exception text field is too short
Add a "Remove all breakpoints except this one" in the breakpoint context menu
Gray out the step into command when it is not possible to step into
Improve pick in inheritance clauses (redefine, rename)
Make it possible to drag the selection (copy/paste)
Improve auto-completion in new lines
Emacs integration with COM on Windows, Netscape on Linux
Add "Add setter feature"
Add an option to search outside the comments/indexing clauses
When a class that does not belong to the universe is typed, put it in red
Auto-complete when user presses ;,.) …, not only return
Change number of classes per big_file_Cxx.c and make it user-definable
Track effective object creation => remove classes that are never instanciated (problem comes from reverse assignments)
Propose to discard debug clauses when finalizing
Make the EIFGEN directory name user-defined in the Ace or <project_name>_gen
Ability to create .rc files (Windows)
Send an event at the end of finish_freezing/during C compilation
Add compilation time information
Make freeze/finalize melt .NET projects
Fix inlining (run-time panics) and improve it
When a .def file is present in the Ace, automatically add the right features as "export"
put #ifdef in Ace files, to change options between workbench and finalized, ….
Optimize the initialization of local variables
Optimize the number of local variables
Add post-build scripts
Add beep after finalization
once per object, per thread, per process, per generic instantiatio
Separate error messages in warnings, obsoletes and errors
If a precompiled library is missing, try to compile anyway (compiler option? Ace option?)
Report an error when an invalid .def file is specified in `shared_library_definition'.
Report several errors at the same time
Creation calls should never be polymorphic (and should be candidate to inlining)
Deferred features that have only one implementer should not be called polymorphicly either
Optimize the size of polymorphic tables by ordering classes better
Melt agents
Detect and optimize static calls by not passing the object parameter and not even computing it whenever possible
Use & instead of && to translate and to prevent an if block
Remove classes that are never instantiated from the system (warning: they may be instantiated outside Eiffel code or in a STORABLE)
Remove the extra indirection in non generic polymorphic calls
Improve the management of SPECIAL[expanded]
Remove deferred classes from the polymorphic tables (and when available also optionally remove classes that are never instantiated)

Drag down the code of features into the nearest common ancestor to all classes that use the feature. Optionally drag the code down to all classes that use the feature (flat out all classes). This should remove polymorphic calls inside features (but increase the code size)
Make the finalization independent from the workbench mode: this would remove bugs (cf DH) and facilitate some optimizations
Save project file even if we don't have a successful compilation, so that we can resume compilation later on
Design a unmutable STRING class (and a builder for such strings)
Design new libraries
Really test libraries
Keep the documentation up-to-date
Use consistent naming (isfirst/islast)
Add a calendar control in Vision2
Add a support for ActiveX in Vision2
Introduce agents in EiffelBase
